DOC.brief_summary: Assessment of duration of action, safety & toleration of different formulations and doses of UK-369,003 and Cialis in patients with male erectile dysfunction. Patients should have previously been on PDE5 inhibitors and have been respondents to the drug. Duration of treatment is 4 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Of Duration Of Action, Safety & Toleration Of UK369,003 and Cialis In Patients With Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Erectile Dysfunction Alpha blockers and Nitrates of any preparation
